title: PICS: Inside Clement Maosa and his fiancée's intimate baby shower
text:
PICS: Inside Clement Maosa and his fiancée's intimate baby shower share this

Cape Town - Skeem Saam actor Clement Maosa's countdown to the birth of his first child with his fiancée is on, and it started off with a bright and beautiful baby shower this past weekend.

The lavish baby shower was held at the Giglio Boutique Hotel in Bedfordview and was attended by industry peers and close friends, which included: Caster Semenya, Dr Musa Mthombeni, Nolwazi Ngubane and Andile Ncube.

Taking to his Instagram account, Clement shared a series of stunning pictures from the baby shower and expressed that he was in awe of God's grace.

The Skeem Saam actor, who plays "Kwaito" in the popular SABC1 show, announced that his fiancée was pregnant in September.

READ MORE: 'Skeem Saam’s' Clement Maosa is going to be a dad
